Site Name

    Welcome to Gilmore

    A multipurpose site template for Squiz Matrix to kick-start your next digital campaign

    Read more

    Perfect for mini-sites

    Gilmore is the perfect template to get started with a mini site when you just need to get a few web pages up to promote your product, business, or event.

    Bootstrap 4

    Built on Bootstrap 4 to make it easy to extend and build out your site further with more components.

    Font Awesome

    Uses Font Awesome version 5 so that you can easily include and use a huge range of icons for your components.

    Themeable

    Easy to theme using Bootstrap 4's SASS variables to make the site follow your company's brand.

    Download from the Squiz Marketplace today!
